medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain with associated nausea and vomiting.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The abdominal pain began the previous evening when the patient reported chest pain to his wife, which later became apparent as abdominal pain. Initially, he developed nausea and subsequently vomited significant coffee grounds. His abdominal pain resolved in the Emergency Department and there were changes noted in vital signs requiring fluid resuscitation.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Dementia NOS, hypertension (HTN), diabetes, history of seizures.
